response.overview: On Saturday 14th January 2012, a select number of fans descended on West London's Metropolis Studios complex, to experience an exclusive blistering live Heaven 17 concert, in an intimate 'club' setting.  Heaven 17 - 'Live From Metropolis Studios' features some of their biggest hits and best known tracks including '(We Don't Need This) Fascist Groove Thang', 'Penthouse And Pavement', 'Crushed By The Wheels Of Industry', 'Let Me Go' and 'Temptation'.
response.title: Heaven 17 Live from Metropolis Studios
